row.process: :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_RA_REST.PRV.INCLUDE.CONNECTION_IS_SET_FROM_PROMPTS :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_RA_REST.PRV.INCLUDE.PUT_ATT_ENDPOINT :PUT_ATT conn_auth_method = "Kerberos" !Authen mode prompt :PUT_ATT conn_auth_kerberos_username = &CONN_AUTH_KERBEROS_USERNAME# :PUT_ATT conn_auth_kerberos_password = &CONN_AUTH_KERBEROS_PASSWORD# :PUT_ATT conn_auth_kerberos_kdc = &CONN_AUTH_KERBEROS_KDC# :PUT_ATT conn_auth_kerberos_realm = &CONN_AUTH_KERBEROS_REALM# :PUT_ATT conn_auth_kerberos_http_upcase = &CONN_AUTH_KERBEROS_HTTP_UPCASE# :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_RA_REST.PRV.INCLUDE.PUT_ATT_PROXY :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_RA_REST.PRV.INCLUDE.PUT_ATT_ADVANCE
